pr_title: pscanrules: CSP Scan Rule handle potential IllegalArgumentException

timeline.author: thc202
thc202

timeline.bodyText: Should check just report-uri? The report-to does not seem to cause an exception(?).
timeline.author: thc202

timeline.bodyText: This could be done as an else if of the following, it's clearer that the hasReportUri takes precedence that way.
timeline.author: thc202

timeline.message:
pscanrules: CSP Scan Rule handle potential IllegalArgumentException

- Handle an IllegalArgumentException that could occur in the CSP scan
rule if multiple CSP headers were present and one (or more) had a
report-uri or report-to directive when trying to merge them.
- Add unit tests and add change note to CHANGELOG.

Signed-off-by: kingthorin <kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com>
